title: Monaco GP dreams crushed: 5 F1 drivers who crashed while ahead
summary: It doesn't matter how big your lead is at Monaco: the circuit is ready and waiting to punish the tiniest mistake, as these five drivers, who looked to be on course for victory, found to their cost
